pis_title: Glossy Interior Latex Paint – Product Information Sheet (PIS)

titles.title: Low VOC (Eco Safe), Scrub-Resistant
titles.premium: Great Coverage | Water Based (Solvent Free) | Easy to Wash (Stain Resistant) | Eco Friendly | Long-lasting Glow
titles.title2: Gloss-finish interior paint with high sheen and easy-clean properties

product_overview: Gloss-finish interior paint with high sheen and easy-clean properties.
short_description: Glossy luxury paint for statement walls and halls.
positioning: LustroLite delivers a polished, reflective finish with high durability and designer-grade clarity.

features_benefits.benefit: Adds a polished, reflective finish ideal for statement walls
Maintains vibrancy and prevents fading over time
Surface can be wiped clean without dulling the gloss
Low-VOC, safe for interiors and better for indoor air quality

recommended_use.intro: Ideal for high-impact interiors that demand a premium glossy finish.

application_system.label: Prepare Surface
application_system.purpose: Ensure substrate is dry, smooth, and dust-free

application_system.label: Primer Coat (optional)
application_system.purpose: Recommended for MDF, wood, or patched substrates to improve adhesion

application_system.label: Topcoat
application_system.purpose: Apply 2 coats for rich gloss and durability

recommended_substrates.description: Interior trims, doors, and decorative woodwork

surface_preparation: Ensure surface is dry and dust-free
Remove loose particles and old flaking paint
Sand glossy surfaces lightly for adhesion
Prime porous substrates like MDF or new wood
application: Apply 2 coats with brush, roller, or spray
Thin as per label if necessary

limitations.Application Conditions: Do not apply in damp or poorly ventilated spaces

storage_safety: Store sealed in a dry, cool place
Keep away from children and food

safety_first_aid.General: Avoid prolonged contact with skin and eyes
safety_first_aid.Eye Contact: Rinse with plenty of water; seek medical attention if irritation persists
safety_first_aid.Inhalation: Ensure proper ventilation; wear a mask when spraying
safety_first_aid.Ingestion: Do not induce vomiting; seek immediate medical attention
safety_first_aid.Waste Disposal: Dispose according to local environmental regulations

environmental_commitment: Low-VOC, water-based formulation minimizes environmental footprint and ensures healthier interiors.

specs_summary.application_instructions: Apply 2 coats with brush, roller, or spray on a clean, dry surface.
specs_summary.preparation_instructions: Ensure substrate is smooth, clean, and primed if required
specs_summary.safety_precautions: Use gloves and PPE when spraying; ensure ventilation
specs_summary.storage_instructions: Store in cool, sealed container away from sunlight
